t:
In the past six years my wife has had four miscarriages.
We're still trying for our first child.




And I've a feeling that this
time we'll succeed;
     today she's finally turning 18.
c:
I've a gift for her. It'll take nine months though.



#wife #miscarriage #childless #underage #childmarriage #crime #childabuse #girlchild
